language_elements.name: terms-changed-description
language_elements.value:
Procelio's terms of use have changed and required additional agreement to play the game.

See <link="%PRIVACY%"><color=blue>Privacy Policy</color></link>
See <link="%TOS%"><color=blue>Terms of Service</color></link>

Do you agree to the above-linked documents?

language_elements.name: loading-error-accountstate-description
language_elements.value: Unable to download account server state

language_elements.name: loading-error-cullbots-description
language_elements.value: Unable to download AI bot files

language_elements.name: conn-files-failed-description
language_elements.value: Unable to connect to files server

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-noagreement-description
language_elements.value: You must agree to the terms of use to play Procelio

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-pwtoolong-description
language_elements.value: Password too long. Please limit to 128 characters/bytes

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-pwtooshort-description
language_elements.value: Password too short. Must be at least 8 characters long

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-usertoolong-description
language_elements.value: Username too long. May be at most 28 characters

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-userbad-description
language_elements.value: Username may only contain valid ASCII graphical characters

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-bademail-description
language_elements.value:
A valid email is required for password recovery
(Disposable addresses permitted, at user's risk of account loss)

language_elements.name: acct-create-err-server-description
language_elements.value: Internal server error (go yell at devs)

language_elements.name: confirm-graphics-body
language_elements.value:
Click "OK" if the graphics settings are acceptable.
Settings will revert in 10 seconds...

language_elements.name: cosmetic-skin_gun_camo-desc
language_elements.value:
DDPAT Camo skin.

For primary weapons.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-skin_mov_wing_fed-desc
language_elements.value:
This constitutes a false flag operation.

Applicable to wings and rudders.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-skin_mov_wing_camo-desc
language_elements.value:
For hiding aircraft inside pixelated environments.

Applicable to wings and rudders.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowred-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a red color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowblue-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a purple-blue color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowyellow-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a yellow color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowgreen-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a green color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowpurple-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a purple color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partgloworange-desc

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowwhite-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a white color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowblack-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a black color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowmilitary-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a military green color.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowbee-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a bee inspired gradient.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowice-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate an ice inspired gradient.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowdarkred-desc
language_elements.value:
Gives an electroplate a dark red color. 

Nothing edgier than a spoon.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowpurpulse-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a purple/black pulsing gradient.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowthunder-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a pulsing thunder inspired gradient.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowearth-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate an earth inspired gradient.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-partglowrainbow-desc
language_elements.value:
Gives an electroplate the rainbow gradient.

For the true gamer.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatterncube-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a cubed pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatterntri1-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a triangled pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatterntri2-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a triangled pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatterntri3-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a triangled pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatterncarbon-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a carbon fiber pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatterncamo-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate an urban DDPAT camouflage pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatternprem1-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a low poly pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatternprem2-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a hazard stripe pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatternprem3-desc
language_elements.value: Gives an electroplate a squared pattern.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustpurple-desc
language_elements.value:
Simply purple, not very exciting.

An alternate exhaust trail for thrusters,

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustblue-desc
language_elements.value:
Also useful for sleeping!

An alternate exhaust trail for thrusters,

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustmusic-desc
language_elements.value:
Pretty sound waves, by Blade (he just does the music).

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustplasma-desc
language_elements.value:
Nova styled thruster exhaust.

An alternate exhaust trail for thrusters.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustglow-desc
language_elements.value:
Don't look directly at it.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustpan-desc

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustgreen-desc
language_elements.value:

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustrings-desc

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustclassic-desc

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhausthexglow-desc
language_elements.value:
A red glowing hex trail.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustwireframe-desc
language_elements.value:
Rotating a cube inside your mind is always free.

language_elements.name: cosmetic-thrusterexhaustspiral-desc
language_elements.value:
Your thrust will be the thrust that pierces the heavens.

language_elements.value:

DOOT DOOT

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatternhlwn222-desc
language_elements.value:

DOOT DOOT

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatternxmas122-desc

language_elements.name: cosmetic-electroplatepatternxmas222-desc
language_elements.value:

language_elements.name: block-alpha_1x2core-desc
language_elements.value: The controller and power core of a robot. Any blocks disconnected from it are destroyed, and if no functional components remain your bot will be destroyed.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whitecube-desc
language_elements.value: Your generic 6-sided chassis block, allowing connectivity and damage flow on all sides.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whiteinner-desc
language_elements.value: A truncated chassis cube: the same connectivity at lower weight.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whiteprism-desc
language_elements.value: A prism-shaped chassis piece. Used for aesthetics or for its lower weight.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whitetetra-desc
language_elements.value: A small lightweight chassis component, often used for routing connectivity and damage flow.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_whitepyramid-desc
language_elements.value: A square-bottom variant of the tetra.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavycube-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis cube.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavyinner-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis inner.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavyprism-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis prism.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavytetra-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis tetra.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_heavypyramid-desc
language_elements.value: A heavier variant of the chassis pyramid.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glasscube-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis cube.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glassinner-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis inner.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glassprism-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis prism.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glasstetra-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis tetra.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_glasspyramid-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis pyramid.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_coppercube-desc
language_elements.value: A smoother variant of the chassis cube.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_copperinner-desc
language_elements.value: A smoother variant of the chassis inner.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_copperprism-desc
language_elements.value: A smoother variant of the chassis prism.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_coppertetra-desc
language_elements.value: A smoother variant of the chassis tetra.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_copperpyramid-desc
language_elements.value: A smoother variant of the chassis pyramid.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_carboncube-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis cube.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_carboninner-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis inner.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_carbonprism-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis prism.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_carbontetra-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis tetra.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_carbonpyramid-desc
language_elements.value: A lighter and more reflective variant of the chassis pyramid.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight3-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight3_flat-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight flat rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight4-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight5-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight5_flat-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight flat rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_straight6-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_angled3-desc
language_elements.value: An angled lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_angled5-desc
language_elements.value: An angled lightweight rod featuring connections on both ends.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_airframe_tjunction3-desc
language_elements.value: A lightweight split rod featuring connections on each end.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_thruster_t1-desc
language_elements.value: A small and simple thruster that can apply force in the placed direction.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_topmount_thruster-desc
language_elements.value: A small and simple thruster, attached directly to a robot.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_thruster_t5-desc
language_elements.value: A medium sized thruster that can apply force in the placed direction.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_thruster_t9-desc
language_elements.value: A large and powerful thruster that can apply force in the placed direction.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wheel_t9-desc
language_elements.value:
A wheel. Does wheel things.
Can steer.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_nonsteering_wheel-desc
language_elements.value:
A wheel. Does wheel things.
Does not steer.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_hoverblade_t9-desc
language_elements.value: A powerful fan providing movement within a moderate distance from the ground.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_repulsor_pad-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech repulsion pad, allowing frictionless travel over terrain in all directions.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_tank_track_left-desc
language_elements.value:
A durable continous track with multiple drive gears.

Hold 'down' to enter high gear, gaining speed but sacrificing turning.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_tank_track_right-desc
language_elements.value:
A durable continous track with multiple drive gears.

Hold 'down' to enter high gear, gaining speed but sacrificing turning.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_tank_track_central-desc
language_elements.value: YOU'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO BE HERE.

language_elements.name: block-mov_leg_small-desc
language_elements.value:
An agile leg mimicing Earth insects, allowing robots to stably walk on walls and beneath overhangs.

Press XXX to jump. Hold XXX to crouch, charging a boosted jump. Continue holding XXX after jumping to skate after landing.

language_elements.name: block-mov_leg_medium-desc
language_elements.value:
A durable leg mimicing Earth insects, allowing robots to stably walk on walls and beneath overhangs.

Press XXX to jump. Hold XXX to crouch, charging a boosted jump. Continue holding XXX after jumping to skate after landing.

language_elements.name: block-mov_leg_large-desc
language_elements.value: A tanky leg mimicing Earth insects, allowing robots to walk on stably walls and beneath overhangs. Press XXX to jump. Hold XXX to crouch, charging a boosted jump. Unlike its lighter counterparts, Heavy legs are incapable of skating.

language_elements.name: block-mov_wing_flat-desc
language_elements.value:
Simple wings with good low-speed control and modest lift. 

Prone to diminished control from overspeed.

language_elements.name: block-mov_wing_swept-desc
language_elements.value:
Stable, high lift wings with moderate drag.
Harder to stall.

language_elements.name: block-mov_wing_delta-desc
language_elements.value:
Unstable wings with great high speed performance and control, but prone to stalls. 

Lift performance is reliant on high speeds.

language_elements.name: block-mov_rud_flat-desc
language_elements.value: Control surfaces with good stabilization properties, but low lift.

language_elements.name: block-mov_rud_swept-desc
language_elements.value: Control surfaces with good stabilization properties, but low lift.

language_elements.name: block-mov_rud_delta-desc
language_elements.value: Control surfaces with good stabilization properties, but low lift.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wing_swept_l-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wing_swept_r-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wing_flat_l-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_wing_flat_r-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_rudder-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_large_rudder-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_rudder_i-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_large_rudder_i-desc
language_elements.value: A relic of a past time. Probably shouldn't be here.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_gyroscope-desc
language_elements.value:
On activation, helps counteract bot rotation.

Stacking grants additional charges.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_radar_jammer-desc
language_elements.value: Counteracts the effects of enemy radar for your bot.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_lasergun_t9-desc
language_elements.value: A simple fully automatic gun that fires high-energy beams.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_railgun-desc
language_elements.value: A long-distance, high velocity sniper cannon with a magazine.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_plasmacannon-desc
language_elements.value: Fires a volley of unstable energy payloads.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_nanoassembler-desc
language_elements.value: Experimental weapon that repairs allied bots.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_rivetrifle-desc
language_elements.value: Power tool turned weapon that fires superheated rivets from a magazine.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_macrowave-desc
language_elements.value: YOU'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO BE HERE.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_missile_salvo-desc
language_elements.value: Fires a manually-loaded volley of unguided rockets.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_trace_missile-desc
language_elements.value: Fires an automatic stream of laser-guided missiles.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_slab_launcher-desc
language_elements.value: Heavy turret that launches large slabs of matter.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_energyblade-desc
language_elements.value:
WARNING: Legacy Content, may be unstable.

Contained Arc Saw that cuts into enemy bots as a melee attack.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_minelayer-desc
language_elements.value: Drops a mine onto the ground which, after activating, will detonate when other bots approach.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_shieldprojector-desc
language_elements.value: Projects an energy shield to block incoming projectiles.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_smokescreen-desc
language_elements.value: Launches a canister that emits a cloud of smoke where it lands.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_sec_minigun-desc
language_elements.value: A devastating fully automatic cannon with limited mount rotation and an internal magazine.

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_a_l-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage.

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_a_r-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage.

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_b_l-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage.

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_b_r-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage.

language_elements.name: block-electroplate_c-desc
language_elements.value: A high-tech energy shield which recharges after taking damage.

language_elements.name: block-helium_112-desc
language_elements.value: A tiny tank of lighter-than-air gas.

language_elements.name: block-helium_123-desc
language_elements.value: A small tank of lighter-than-air gas.

language_elements.name: block-helium_224-desc
language_elements.value: A medium tank of lighter-than-air gas.

language_elements.name: block-helium_335-desc
language_elements.value: A large tank of lighter-than-air gas.

language_elements.name: block-helium_348-desc
language_elements.value: A massive tank of lighter-than-air gas.

language_elements.name: block-mod_dash-desc
language_elements.value:
On activation, create a singularity that displaces bot in desired direction.

Stacking grants additional charges.

language_elements.name: block-mod_flare-desc
language_elements.value:
On activation, grants temporary immunity to lock-ons and deploys a field that destroys nova projectiles and missiles.

Stacking grants additional charges.

language_elements.name: block-mod_fuel-desc
language_elements.value:
On activation, expend turbofuel to tremendously increase thrust output of thrusters that align with the afterburner.

Stacking grants additional tank capacity.

language_elements.name: block-mod_shockwave-desc
language_elements.value:
On activation, release a radial blast that damages and pushes enemy bots away.

Stacking grants additional charges.

language_elements.name: block-mod_overshield-desc
language_elements.value:
Passively creates a full-bot overshield that takes incoming damage before the bot does, with a slow recharge.

Stacking grants additional overshield.

language_elements.name: block-mod_spoofer-desc
language_elements.value:
On activation, temporarily disguise your IFF signal to appear as an ally to your enemies, fooling mines and missile locks as well. Taking and dealing damage drains the effect faster.

Stacking grants additional disguide time.

language_elements.name: block-mod_forge-desc
language_elements.value:
Passively restocks secondary weapon systems.

Stacking grants additional restock speed.

language_elements.name: block-ammo_box_small-desc
language_elements.value: Provides a small increase of reserve ammunition to supplement your equipped secondary weapon system.

language_elements.name: block-ammo_box_large-desc
language_elements.value: Provides a large increase of reserve ammunition to supplement your equipped secondary weapon system.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_isopod_cosmetic-desc
language_elements.value:
Our little isopod mascot, the original.

Don't worry, this is just a decoy.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_isopod_xmas-desc
language_elements.value:
Our little isopod mascot, in seasonal spirit!

Don't worry, this is just a decoy.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_isopod_nwyrs23-desc
language_elements.value:
Our little isopod mascot is wishing you a happy new year!

Don't worry, this is just a decoy.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_headlight_standard-desc
language_elements.value: A flat headlight, for nighttime warfare.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_vapor_cosmetic-desc
language_elements.value: Emits a constant trail of vapor

language_elements.name: block-cosm_arm-desc
language_elements.value:
Well, never know when you're going to find a perfectly good rock.

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_exhaust-desc
language_elements.value: Why limit pollution to just Earth?

language_elements.name: block-cosm_kitt-desc
language_elements.value:
Someone in Osprey R&D was a fan of old sci-fi.

Does not come with voice module.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_smallantenna-desc
language_elements.value:
Comes with jiggle physics! 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_antenna_side-desc
language_elements.value:
Comes with side mounted jiggle physics! 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_largeantenna-desc
language_elements.value:
Enables you to call into One Mars Radio.* 

*Does not actually enable you to call into One Mars Radio.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_smallspike-desc
language_elements.value:
Doesn't do any damage. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_largespike-desc
language_elements.value:
Doesn't do any damage, but larger. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_smalltailspike-desc
language_elements.value:
Doesn't help your aerodynamics. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_largetailspike-desc
language_elements.value:
Doesn't help your aerodynamics, but larger. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_smallnosecone-desc
language_elements.value:
Doesn't help your aerodynamics, but looks cool. 

Purely cool.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_largenosecone-desc
language_elements.value:
Doesn't help your aerodynamics, but larger. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_mechhead-desc
language_elements.value:
Twin-Linked Vertec Mk.IV Gauss Rifles not included. 

Purely cosmetic

language_elements.name: block-cosm_screwgreeble-desc
language_elements.value:
Speculated to improve the structural stability of fish-inspired crafts by up to 10%. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_pan9k-desc
language_elements.value:
I'm sorry, Brenn. I'm afraid I can't do that. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_pan9a-desc
language_elements.value:
Not to be trusted near space infrastructure. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-paint_diagcube-desc
language_elements.value: A full chassis cube with an alternate paint job.

language_elements.name: block-paint_halfcube-desc
language_elements.value: A full chassis cube with an alternate paint job.

language_elements.name: block-alpha_ventcube-desc
language_elements.value: A chassis cube with only a mild chance of containing infiltrators.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_vent_long-desc
language_elements.value: A 2 block long vent with only a slightly larger chance of containing infiltrators.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate1-desc
language_elements.value:
A 1x2 Osprey sticker. 

We will not pay you for using this.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate2-desc
language_elements.value:
A 2x2 Spacetek Dynamics sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate3-desc
language_elements.value:
A 2x3 Hypox Mining Company sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate4-desc
language_elements.value:
A 2x2 Osprey Bird sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate5-desc
language_elements.value:
A 2x2 Frontiersmen faction sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate6-desc
language_elements.value:
A 2x3 Red Sand Rail Company sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate7-desc
language_elements.value:
A 1x2 hazard stripes sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate8-desc
language_elements.value:
A 1x3 hazard stripes sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate15-desc
language_elements.value:
A 1x2 mirrored hazard stripes sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate16-desc
language_elements.value:
A 1x3 mirrored hazard stripes sticker. 

Purely cosmetic.

language_elements.name: block-cosm_stickerplate10-desc
language_elements.value:
A 2x2 Vertec Sniper Sticker.

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-maxcpu
language_elements.value: Placement would exceed maximum complexity limits

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-noblocks
language_elements.value: No more blocks of that type

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-archetype
language_elements.value: Component incompatible with parts already on bot

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-module
language_elements.value: Only four types of modules are permitted on a bot

language_elements.name: build-placement-error-collide
language_elements.value: Unable to replace all parts (collision, inventory count, etc.)

language_elements.name: build-advanced-desc
language_elements.value: Place parts with advanced orientation control.

language_elements.name: robot-validate-error-zerocore
language_elements.value: Robot does not have a core

language_elements.name: matchmaking-failed-body
language_elements.value: An unknown error occurred. Please try again. If the error persists, let devs know.

language_elements.name: paint-premiumonly-body
language_elements.value: Custom paint palettes only available with Procelio Premium

language_elements.name: network-out-of-date-body
language_elements.value: Your client is incompatible with the current game servers. Please update to the newest version via our website [procelio.com].

language_elements.name: i-accept-the-terms-of-usage-and-privacy-policy
language_elements.value: I accept the terms of usage & privacy policy

language_elements.name: maindesc-online
language_elements.value: Jump into battle against players online.

language_elements.name: maindesc-garage
language_elements.value: Create, test and manage your robots.

language_elements.name: early-access-warning
language_elements.value: Procelio is still in active development! You may run across missing or unfinished features.

language_elements.name: video-setting-description-template
language_elements.value: This is a template description. It contains a lot of text that may or may not ever be read by players. If you can read this, mention me in your screenshot (@snip_3d #6594 on discord). I would be curious to know how you managed to see this text! I am the one who wrote this default text. The purpose of it is to fill space so that I can correctly lay out extensive text boxes so that they are not cut off. Designing UI is hard. It's especially frustrating when you have to design it so that it scales, but it's satisfying when it works. I am now venting into a default text box. Perhaps I should stop and get back to actual work... maybe...

language_elements.name: flip-instruction-completed
language_elements.value:
THANK YOU FOR
FLYING WITH OSPREY

language_elements.name: oob-console
language_elements.value:
Robot control connection interrupted.
ERRx02: Connection Terminated.

language_elements.name: respawn-console
language_elements.value:
Robot control connection interrupted.
ERRx01: Out of Control Range.

language_elements.name: replay-warning
language_elements.value: replay files are version-dependant, and may not be compatible with future versions of procelio!

language_elements.name: gamedesc-capture
language_elements.value: Fight over multiple control points for victory.

language_elements.name: shop-help-desc
language_elements.value:
LEFT CLICK to add a part to your purchase order.

RIGHT CLICK to sell a part from your inventory.

SHIFT + CLICK to add / sell 5x at a time.

CTRL + CLICK to add / sell 10x at a time.

Hit CONFIRM to process the order.

language_elements.name: autobuy-help-desc
language_elements.value:
When enabled, Osprey will automatically purchase parts as you place them in build mode. 

This deducts the associated credits from your account and adds the part to your inventory in real time.

NOTICE: Employee debts generated by auto-purchasing parts are non-refundable. Proceed with caution.

language_elements.name: techtree-wip-desc
language_elements.value:
The Osprey modular hardware research and development department is being researched...
and developed. come back later!

language_elements.name: infolog_ffffff_test_run_please_ignore-body
language_elements.value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

language_elements.name: infolog_4_operation_advice-body
language_elements.value: Have you suffered repeated losses when using an Osprey Modular Vehicle product? Try working on your driving and aiming skills, or request a new Modular Vehicle from our design team!

language_elements.name: infolog_267_help-body
language_elements.value: please help me im so tired of writing these

language_elements.name: infolog_148_cosmetics-body
language_elements.value: The Craig cosmetic is not real and is a model. No isopods were harmed in the making of this project.

language_elements.name: infolog_171_atmospheric_warning-body
language_elements.value: To all planet-side employees, this your monthly reminder that Mars is cold, inhospitable, and has no breathable atmosphere. Don't get excited, and always remember to bring your suit.

language_elements.name: infolog_135_osprey_home-body
language_elements.value:
Did you know? 

It is illegal to wield a fire axe within the Osprey HOME Testing Environment without a license.

language_elements.name: infolog_137_osprey_home-body
language_elements.value:
Did you know? 

The Osprey HOME Testing Environment is not very energy efficient.

language_elements.name: infolog_err_system_malfunction-body
language_elements.value: This fault should not occur. Please report it to Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology's Classified Research and Development department immediately.

language_elements.name: infolog_0_adding_tooltips-body
language_elements.value:
Your Procelio software package comes with 'Loading Screen Tooltips' functionality.

While still in the prototype stage, Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology is committed to bringing you best-in-class tips and tricks with which to dominate your adversaries!

language_elements.name: infolog_38_sights-body
language_elements.value:
Right clicking with any Osprey weapon equipped will focus your AR rendering and zoom in for increased precision at a greater distance.

For a more mild zoom, press ${DriveZoom} to lower your Field of View on command, temporarily increasing mid-range precision.

language_elements.name: infolog_25_augmented_reality_controls-body
language_elements.value:
AR Technology made available to Osprey Modular Vehicle operators and designers allows you to visualize certain elements of bot metadata at the press of a button!

In Build and Test mode, open the Gizmos menu to see options to display important infomartion like your vehicle's center of mass or collision boxes.

language_elements.name: infolog_11_electrolaser_mastery-body
language_elements.value: The Electrolaser Carbine (ELC) fires a continuous flurry of high energy bolts at the enemy, gaining inaccuracy over time. Hold off the trigger between shots to let the guns recalibrate, and tap the fire button to fire accurate shots over long distances.

language_elements.name: infolog_12_nova_cannon_mastery-body
language_elements.value:
The Nova Cannon fires intense volleys of superheated energy at the enemy. These volleys inherit some of your bots velocity and arc downwards with gravity, so plan accordingly. Nova shots explode on impact, dealing splash damage. 

Did you know? The reload times for Nova Lauchers scale with the amount of guns on your robot.

language_elements.name: infolog_13_gauss_rifle_mastery-body
language_elements.value:
The Electromagnetic Gauss Rifle is a high precision tool of destruction. The rifle becomes unstable while moving, but the integrated laser sight will always shine true to where it's aiming. Learn to fire when you see it line up with your target.

The Gauss Rifle uses a shell-based magazine. Press ${DriveReload} to start reloading, and you can cancel any time after the first shell reloads.

language_elements.name: infolog_14_rivet_rifle_mastery-body
language_elements.value:
The Rivet Rifle was originally a tool for construction, but it fares equally as well in robot destruction. It pulls from a passively recharging magazine and can be fired semi automatically to maintain accuracy.

Hold fire to engage full auto mode, but keep in mind the fire pattern spreads quickly this way.

language_elements.name: infolog_17_missile_pod_mastery-body
language_elements.value: A versatile but simple secondary weapon, use these smart missiles to finish off low health enemies, or pressure stationary targets (such as Gauss snipers) into moving out of position.

language_elements.name: infolog_18_mine_layer_mastery-body
language_elements.value: Putting landmines in difficult to see places will surprise (damage) the enemy before engagement. They can also be used as improvised bombs on aircraft, but be mindful of their arm time.

language_elements.name: infolog_19_smoke_module_mastery-body
language_elements.value: Absolutely decimate the enemy by blinding them with smoke. Might also blind yourself.

language_elements.name: infolog_20_cas_cutter_mastery-body
language_elements.value:
These Contained Arc Saws will cut through anything, including other robots. Getting up close and personal, the cutter can output high amounts of damage in a flash, but puts the user's craft in danger. 

Consider escape routes before engaging.

language_elements.name: infolog_21_module_deck-body
language_elements.value: Multiple modules can be equipped at once, with their activation keys being shown next to the weapons module in the HUD. If a module is destroyed, an error sign will take its place.

language_elements.name: infolog_27_osprey_building_system-body
language_elements.value:
Did you know? 

It is possible to replace all primary weapons at once, by placing a new weapon of your choice on top of any of your existing weaponry

language_elements.name: infolog_28_osprey_test_simulacrum-body
language_elements.value:
Did you know? 

It is possible to switch between multiple testing environments within your Procelio software package settings.

language_elements.name: infolog_29_osprey_garage_screens-body
language_elements.value:
Did you know? 

It is possible to change the garage panel displays within your Procelio software package settings.

language_elements.name: infolog_31_osprey_logbook-body
language_elements.value:
Did you know? 

An Osprey Employee Logbook comes standard with your Procelio software package.

language_elements.name: infolog_32_musical_motivation-body
language_elements.value:
Did you know? 

You are able to add custom music to your radio.

language_elements.name: infolog_33_flat_wings-body
language_elements.value: Flat wings provide great redundancy with their cheap cost and provide good control at low speeds, but are prone to overspeed. It will take longer to turn at speed without outside forces.

language_elements.name: infolog_33_swept_wings-body
language_elements.value: Swept wings provide a great middle ground between ease of use, control, and lift, at the cost of price. If you're not sure what kind of plane to build, consider starting here.

language_elements.name: infolog_35_delta_wings-body
language_elements.value: Looking for some high speed action? Delta wings provide high control and lift performance at speed, but are more prone to lose control during sharp turns and stalls.

language_elements.name: infolog_36_rudders-body
language_elements.value:
Rudders provide more control and stability surfaces for your aircraft to work with, but do not provide much lift.

All rudders provide the same control benefits.

language_elements.name: infolog_37_flight-body
language_elements.value: Making a flying bot requires wings, thrust, and balance. Your bot will try to split lift and other forces across multiple wings to maintain stable flight, but flying bots are ultimately more fragile than grounded ones.

language_elements.name: infolog_38_tank_tracks-body
language_elements.value:
Tank tracks provide excellent armor for their power requirements, at the cost of an increased mass. While more sluggish in the long run compared to other ground movement types, tanks make up for this in their superior in-combat maneuvering, on-the-spot turning, and hill climbning ability. 
Hold ${RobotDriveDown} to enter high gear.

language_elements.name: infolog_39_tank_gears-body
language_elements.value: When using Tank Tracks, hold ${RobotDriveDown} to enter high gear. While in high gear, your direct drive power and speed is greatly increased, at the cost of turning ability. Use it to cover long distances outside of combat, or for a faster escape. Be wary of the short cooldown when switching gears.

language_elements.name: infolog_41_advanced_build_mode-body
language_elements.value: While in the garage, hold down ${GarageEnableAdvanced} to enter advanced build mode. When in advanced mode, you can use various keys to adjust block position and rotation in 3D space, without needing to bridge off of existing parts.

language_elements.name: infolog_42_inertial_rectifier-body
language_elements.value:
While in control of your robot, press ${DriveFlipBot} to gain a vertical boost and align your bot upright. 

Alternatively, hold down ${DriveFlipBot} to control your bots alignment rotation and release to drop your robot in the desired direction.

language_elements.name: infolog_43_iff_tagging-body
language_elements.value:
Your AR HUD comes equiped with a state-of-the-art Identification Friend or Foe (IFF) system. Osprrey's SatOPS teams automatically manage assigning friendly units to your on-screem IFF. 

Press ${BattleEntitySpot} while looking at an unknown unit to mark them as a hostile for both yourself and your allies. Spotted enemies are trackable through walls, but will eventually lose their mark.
 NOTE: Mis-identifying a unit or attempting to identify rocks as enemies will require time for the system to recalibrate, and will be marked on your annual performance review.

language_elements.name: infolog_892_painting-body
language_elements.value:
Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology provides tools to paint your Osprey Modular Vehicle in many different colors. 

Designers may create harmonic gradient palettes.

language_elements.name: infolog_5694_wheels-body
language_elements.value:
Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology's wheels are able to be placed on your Osprey Modular Vehicle. 

A single wheel is able to put out around one thousand brake horsepower.

language_elements.name: infolog_7922_terrain-body
language_elements.value:
Your Osprey Modular Vehicle, if built properly, may traverse many different types of terrain. 

Consider your movement parts well, especially when crossing rocky terrain.

language_elements.name: infolog_1_build_zone-body
language_elements.value: The Build Environment is an Osprey-deployed space outpost for mixed-reality construction and testing of Osprey Modular Vehicle products. Once a robot's design passes client-requested quality assurance testing, the robot is manufactured and shipped planetside.

language_elements.name: infolog_3_neutrality-body
language_elements.value: Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology does not condone the actions of either Hypox or the Aegis Frontiersmen in the ongoing conflict on Mars.

language_elements.name: infolog_6_corporate_partnerships-body
language_elements.value:
Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology is proud to announce its partnership with SpaceTek Dynamics to bring you canisters ideal for use with SpaceTek's LighterThanAir products.

WARNING: ONCE LTA CANISTER IS PRESSURIZED, DO NOT SHAKE, HEAT, OR PUNCTURE.

language_elements.name: infolog_9_work_conditions-body
language_elements.value: In light of recently-publicized claims, Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology would like to remind you that all Innovation Laborers are paid a fair wage and are typically permitted to return to their families on weekends.

language_elements.name: infolog_5_alternative_products-body
language_elements.value: In addition to Modular Vehicles, Osprey provides a number of products designed to make your life easier. Try our Wuud collection, wood-like products made from a wide selection of organic and inorganic materials!

language_elements.name: infolog_7_captain_procelio-body
language_elements.value: Despite rumors to the contrary, Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology has no association with the individual known as 'Captain Procelio' and has no information as to his whereabouts.

language_elements.name: infolog_8_proceli-os-body
language_elements.value: In collaboration with One Mars Radio, Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology's Classified Research and Development Division is proud to announce the public release of "Proceli-Os": Part of a Healthy and Heavy-Metal-Free Breakfast!

language_elements.name: infolog_10_store-of-value-body
language_elements.value: As to better facilitate interplanetary commerce, Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology has begun work on the Future Initiative for Space-based Holdings, a commodity-backed currency project for engaging in stable trade of Osprey (and partners)'s goods without reliance on government fiat.

language_elements.name: infolog_25_shipping_services-body
language_elements.value:
Osprey Modular Hardware and Technology will ship anything, anywhere, fast and safe.

Osprey would like to remind all employees that shipping with Voyant is forbidden outside of raw construction material shipments.

language_elements.name: ma_tollum-body
language_elements.value:
'Treaty Organization for the Legislation and Land Use of Mars.'

Formed by Earth governments at the turn of the 2100's, TOLLUM holds responsibility for alloting and tracking legal distribution and ownership of Martian soil. The Hypox Mining Company lays claim to land granted to it for exclusive use by TOLLUM.

language_elements.name: ma_hypox_mining_company-body
language_elements.value: Hypox Mining Company set foot on Mars, after winning mineral rights from TOLLUM, to extract valuable minerals from the red planet. While investors expected straightforward operations with good returns, their hopes were stymied by the discovery of unlicensed colonies already established on lands now belonging to Hypox.

language_elements.name: ma_osprey_modular_hardware-body
language_elements.value: The foremost entity in private space travel and industry -- rivaling even the United Defense Force's in heavy industry -- Osprey and its myriad subdivisions have the ability to manufacture and transport virtually anything under the sun.

language_elements.name: ma_osprey_robotics-body
language_elements.value: When peaceful efforts to resettle illegal colonies on Hypox's land were met with a string of incidents of property damage and vandalism, the mining company contracted with Osprey's robotics subdivision to dispatch autonomous and remote-controlled drones to protect its property against hostile tresspassers.

language_elements.name: ma_aegis-body
language_elements.value:
AEGIS Colonization Enterprises was established in the early days of Martian colonization (preceding most regulation), offering paid trips and supplies for prospective Martian colonists in exchange for indentured servitude in colony-based production chains.

AEGIS, in cooperation with both governments and private enterprise, has had a hand in not only the majority of colonial settlement, but also in much Martian infrastructure on the whole.

language_elements.name: ma_aegis_frontiersmen-body
language_elements.value:
A militia of hardened survivors who came to Mars seeking new lives and new opportunities under the AEGIS Martian Colonization Initiative who, after completing their contractural period of servitude, set out to claim their own land and form their own settlements. As a result, the Frontiersmen have found themselves in direct conflict with Hypox.
While lacking the formal backing of any Martian organizations, the group has managed to acquire access to the same modular robotics technology from Osprey that Hypox has.

language_elements.name: ma_spacetek_dynamics-body
language_elements.value: SpaceTek Dynamics, one of the leading spacing corporations, specializes in high-tech research and development, exceeding by far Osprey's R&D teams in applied physics research. While the privately-held company is generally secretive about its dealings, it has in the past partnered with AEGIS Colonization Enterprises to build and run the Icarus North Massive Solar Array, and the Deimos Skyhook Project.

language_elements.name: tollum_(for_dummies)-body
language_elements.value:
'Treaty Organization for the Legislation and Land Use of Mars.'

TOLLUM was created by Earth governments in the early 2100s to manage land ownership on Mars. It keeps track of who owns what land, with the Hypox Mining Company receiving exclusive rights to certain areas from TOLLUM.

language_elements.name: hypox_mining_company_(for_dummies)-body
language_elements.value: The Hypox Mining Company came to Mars after getting the right to mine minerals from TOLLUM. They ran into trouble when they found illegal colonies on the land now controlled by Hypox.

language_elements.name: osprey_modular_hardware_(for_dummies)-body
language_elements.value: Osprey is a major player in private space travel and industry, even competing with the United Defense Force in the heavy industry sector. Its many divisions can manufacture and transport almost anything needed for space operations.

language_elements.name: osprey_robotics_(for_dummies)-body
language_elements.value: When Hypox faced vandalism and damage to equipment while trying to move illegal colonies off their land, they hired Osprey's robotics division to send out drones to protect their property from trespassers.

language_elements.name: aegis_(for_dummies)-body
language_elements.value: AEGIS Colonization Enterprises was created early in Mars' settlement, before most laws were in place. They provided settlers with transportation and supplies in exchange for work. AEGIS played a big role in helping to settle Mars and build its infrastructure.

language_elements.name: aegis_frontiersmen_(for_dummies)-body
language_elements.value: The Frontiersmen are a group of former workers who came to Mars under AEGIS. After finishing their service, they chose to settle Mars on their own and came into conflict with Hypox. They also gained access to the same advanced robotics from Osprey that Hypox uses.

language_elements.name: spacetek_dynamics_(for_dummies)-body
language_elements.value: SpaceTek Dynamics is a leading space research company, more advanced than Osprey in applied physics. Though secretive, they have worked with AEGIS on major projects like the Icarus North Solar Array and Deimos Skyhook Project.

language_elements.name: mars_travel_guide_trains-body
language_elements.value: The Red Sand Rail Company, in tight partnership with AEGIS, is responsible for maintaining the high velocity maglev trains that carry goods, cargo, and materials from point to point across Mars. With a maximum surface operating velocity exceeding 3000kph (due to the rarified Martian atmosphere), these reinforced trains are renowned for keeping a tight schedule regardless of weather or debris.

language_elements.name: mars_travel_guide_alpha_prospect-body
language_elements.value: Alpha Prospect is one of the first mining operations established by Hypox in pursuit of rich niobium ores. While largely controlled by Hypox, the mine has become a symbolic landmark and a focal point of Frontiersmen' attacks against Hypox's operations.

language_elements.name: mars_radio_guide_deimos_nexus-body
language_elements.value: Deimos Nexus is the first and largest Spaceport on Mars. Constructed by AEGIS and SpaceTek under the management of TOLLUM, it serves as a massive shipping and immigration center for the red planet. While designated to be neutral ground by Earth nations, even it is not safe from the proxy war on Mars.

language_elements.name: mars_travel_guide_icarus_north-body
language_elements.value: The Icarus North Solar Array is a monumental solar farm built into the Planum Boreale of Mars in a partnership between AEGIS and SpaceTek Dynamics. During the summer season, the massive facility uses rail-mounted solar panels to chase the never-setting polar sun to supposedly generate energy. During the winter months, a complement of SpaceTek's scientists remain at the facility to ensure it remains in good working order.Among other things...

language_elements.name: mars_travel_guide_cebrenia-body
language_elements.value: Despite the widely-popular drone recordings of the Cebrenia quadrangle's Hecates Thelus volcano, access to the quadrant remains strictly prohibited by Martian authorities in the wake of the mysterious implosion in 21XX
